entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IOptionsMonitor does not handle named options correctly #110595
  • Suspiscous comment about constrained calls in `MemoryExtensions.cs`, `StringBuilder.cs`, and `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.cs` #110594
  • Finalize experimental connection Activities #110593
    Future
  • Expression tree vs .NET 9 - compilation error #110592
  • macOS: RSA.Create and Import fails with > 8192-bit keys #110588
    10.0.0
  • Repeated return in ArrayPool #110582
  • Multiple test failures when connecting to corefx-net-http11.azurewebsites.net #110578
  • ObjectDisposedException in HTTP/1.1 Stress #110577
    10.0.0
  • Test failures in `JSImportGenerator.Unit.Tests.Compiles.ValidateGeneratedSourceOutput` #110575
  • Are both System.Management and Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure dead? #110573
  • [GC] Could SVR::memcopy be more efficient? #110571
  • [API Proposal]: Support for Dynamic Event IDs in LoggerMessage Source Generator #110570
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 21 Regressions on 12/3/2024 10:12:58 PM #110581
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: System.IO.Compression.Brotli Regressions on 12/6/2024 12:52:57 AM #110583
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 12/2/2024 3:41:04 PM #110584
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 12/4/2024 5:32:55 PM #110585
  • Postpone marking DAM members until type allocated #110563
  • Error CS0009: Metadata file '/__w/1/s/artifacts/tests/coreclr/AnyOS.x64.Checked/readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2smoke/helperildll.dll' could not be opened #110559

Closed

  • Crash caused by orphaned locks #44071
    Future
  • .NET 9 can not be installed on older macOS #109750
  • [API Proposal]:Add property to HttpClient #110555
  • Consider offering a way to disable `libmsquic` testing #110556
  • Intermittent System.IO Errors During Build, Rebuild, and Clean Operations #110328
  • TCP FastOpen does not work in some Linux .NET binaries #110560
    10.0.0
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization][tracking] Regressions of text APIs when running in *HybridGlobalization* mode. #94473
    10.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] JIT: Assertion failed 'IsMultiRegNode()' during 'Head and tail merge' #110316
    10.0.0
  • iOS test fails with "App is not signed" #110395
  • Network-path references in Uri class are not being parsed #110549
  • [browser][Windows] Chrome WBT timeout on helix if we update chrome #107466
    10.0.0
  • SpawnBrowserAsync on Windows #107771
    10.0.0
  • JSSignatureContext.cs may include incorrect use of Math.Abs #84996
    10.0.0
  • Host: Consider removing of destructors on types used for statics #36580
  • [DAC] ISOSDacInterface:GetMethodDescData reads from nullptr #109877
    10.0.0
  • Semantic Versioning of Azure packages and the System Namespace #110519
  • Test failure: System.Reflection.Tests.InvokeInterpretedTests.VerifyInvokeIsUsingInterpreter_Method #110511
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: boost inlining when callee unboxes an arg #110596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change RSA.LegalKeySizes for Apple platforms to return 8192 #110591
    area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0-staging][wasm] Workaround incorrect mono restore when building WBT #110590
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • Use FLS detach as thread termination notification on windows. #110589
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110580
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Cleanup some dead code #110579
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix potential NRE in GenericSpecializationPartCreationInfo #110569
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Include more edges in `BlockDominancePreds` to avoid a JIT crash #110568
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from runtime code #110567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [no-merge][testing] Try Apple mobile platforms on iOS 18 and XCode 16.1 #110566
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Add wa-info tool to src/mono/wasm/tools #110565
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't wait for finalizers in 'IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources' #110558
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • Use holding thread id in AwareLock to avoid orphaned lock crash #107168
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Speed up surrogate validation in string.Normalize #110574
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Switch to automatic 8.0 version updates #110586
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110481
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove duplicate IsAscii check in string.IsNormalized #110576
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • fix FastOpen compilation #110561
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/8.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110440
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Avoid comparing regnums in `GenTreeHWIntrinsic::Equals` #110535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #110163
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix return address hijacking with CET #109548
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • Enable more ILLinker skipped tests on native AOT #110353
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Remove no_inlining functionality for dead bblocks #110468
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Include more edges in `BlockDominancePreds` #110531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Disable HybridGlobalization tests on WASM #110526
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] fix code gen overflow #110539
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix AV error in DAC on Linux/MacOS #110557
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove ld_classic in 16+ #110542
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [dac] Make `GetObjectStringData` return the needed buffer element count instead of byte count #110540
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Fix calculation of `MethodDesc` optional slot addresses #110491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Don't wait for finalizers in 'IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources' #110551
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: extract BBJ_COND to BBJ_ALWAYS profile repair as utility #110494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up surrogate validation in HttpUtility #110478
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Fix test under JIT stress #110538
    area-System.Reflection, test-bug, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Avoid all compiler optimization on embedded apphost hash #110554
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110548
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Warn on method access in Requires analyzers #110086
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from library tests, WBT and docs #110534
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [NRBF] skip the most time-consuming test case for non-Release builds to avoid timeouts for checked builds #110550
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 10.0.0
  • fix wrong arguments order in CrlCacheExpired call #110457
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110205
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #110224
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Remove DiagnosticSource reference from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #110458
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.13
  • Ensure that we don't try and optimize masks for promoted fields #110485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110438
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Fix a step that becomes a go #110533
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Add an "init BB" invariant #110404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a diagnostic mode for ArrayPool.Shared #109695
    area-System.Runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2598965 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Share threadpool configuration #110469
    area-System.Threading
  • Unify two identical implementations of class_kind in SGen GC bridges #107909
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • Warn on message formatting failure instead of crash, and fix Native AOT MakeGenericType failure #110330
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `VisitLoopBlocksLexical` utility #110490
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Delay creation of scratch block needed by backend #110396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions overloads with comparer #110197
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix aka.ms URL in host's missing framework error #110513
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix `IDE0004` for object comparison #110206
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix CMP0173 policy warning with cmake 3.31 #110522
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110372
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Swift.Runtime should get compiled into its own assembly #2868

PullRequests

Updated

  • added TypeMetadataCache #2867
  • Add documents on the Mono interpreter analysis #2857
    area-CoreclrInterpreter

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DotnetNewListTests failed in CI #45406
  • Single Portable File Configuration #45401
  • Hot Reload Target Process is wrong on MacOs #45399

Closed

  • dotnet CLI: "dotnet help new" does not work #45231
    10.0.1xx
  • [Feature Request]: dotnet CLI - Install SDK(s) #45403
  • dotnet list package --vulnerable throws ArgumentException: '' is not a valid version string [.NET 9] #44838
    9.0.101
  • Disable Tests Failing Due to Initial net10.0 Branding #42850
  • When creating a 6.0 project, there isn't any warning say that 6.0 is out of support. #45390

PullRequests

Created

  • [9.0.2xx] sln migrate, sln list, sln add #45408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix manifest artifacts reading #45407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] fix(cli): dotnet help new link opening #45404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45400
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Dotnet test integration 2 #45398
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45392
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prepare GenAPI so it can be used for a new assembly diff generator #45389
    untriaged, Team:Runtime, Area-Tools

Merged

  • Extend build server shutdown tracing #45393
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • fix(cli): dotnet help new link opening #45282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Stop generating VMR's component list #45391
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add mstest dependency #45322
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • sln-add: Only add guid on slnv12 files #45366
    untriaged
  • Add .json to editorconfig #45227
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Force overwriting packs in FileBasedInstaller when repairing Fixes #31282 #45286
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #45263
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Don't publish PrivateAssets Fixes #39400 #45259
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Better search versions error experience #45144
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Check how often each command resolver is used #45356
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45159
    Approved to merge, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #45383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes middleware invocation arguments use by legacy apply update code path #45298
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use legacy WASM APIs when newer ones are not available #45317
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove global usings from projects building source packages #45339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restore detailed test logging to console output #45343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged
  • Switch verb and noun for package/reference add/remove/list Fixes #9650 #45384
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, consider-for-documentation
  • [9.0.1xx] Avoid warning about empty NuGetPackageRoot in wpftmp projects #44742
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.2
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Use dotnet exec to run test app in CheckTargetFrameworkDisplayName #45332
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use library-packs also when RestoreAdditionalProjectSources is explicitly set. #44863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure all template code files(C#, F#, VB) have consistent BOM #41376
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [dotnet-watch] Improve failure reporting in tests #44879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Params Collections (VS 17.10, .NET 9) #7700
    13.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Remove scope variance exceptions from the speclet #8777
  • Better conversion: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> #8779

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler should not report Warning RZ2012 when using Blazor bind syntax #76356

Closed

  • Refactor -> Extract Method ignores namespace aliases #70024
    Backlog
  • Test Plan for Overload Resolution Priority #74131
    .NET 9
  • Symbol.ToDisplayString(SymbolDisplayFormat.FullyQualifiedFormat) does not escape everything it should #74117
    17.13
  • Potential missed case with `CS1918` #76278
  • Then using extract method it does not respect the selection #72561
    18.0
  • VS 2017 RC - refactor doesnt respect editorconfig settings #32427
    Backlog
  • Fix all of inline temporary with multiple #region directives duplicates a directive #62805
    Backlog
  • 'Inline variable declaration' spacing incorrect with csharp_space_around_declaration_statements=ignore #35993
    Backlog
  • Cache vs-mef composition to improve startup perf #68568
    Backlog
  • Interceptors suppress analyzer warnings when location is the entire `InvocationExpressionSyntax`, but not when location is `InvocationExpressionSyntax.Expression` #76266
  • [nuget add using] would be nice to provide add ref fixer on unresolved using statement #8788
    Backlog
  • Questions about XML Documentation #72528
  • Compilation error involving dynamic parameter not being detected #76322
  • IDE0052 Reported for Ref Field Assignment #71847
    17.13
  • Extract Method changes 'using var' semantic to 'out parameter' semantic #39329
    Backlog
  • Extract Method should understand `using` declarations #35646
    Backlog
  • Extract Method Selection expansion doesn't work if selection starts in an if conditional #18656
    Backlog
  • IDE0032 code fixer misses method arguments and produces invalid C# code (CS0103) #76349
    18.0
  • IDE0017 does not preserve indentation #46665
    Backlog
  • Convert to 'switch' statement changes behaviour #71295
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not check overridden required members during in-type member enforcement #76363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Reduce allocations from doing repeated adds into an ImmutableDictionary in SolutionCompilationState.ComputeFrozenSnapshot #76361
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update 'add parameter' to assign to field/property when adding a parameter to a primary constructor. #76360
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [WIP] Change PR Val builds to be test signed #76358
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Razor synchronize loader #76357
    untriaged
  • Fix TFM inconsistency in BuildHost #76354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initialize fields when possible when adding parameters to constructors. #76352
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • feat(lsp): add --pipe parameter #76351
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement editorconfig serializer for naming style preferences #76350
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not bail generating base type initializer in the presence of use site warnings #76347
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not add imports automatically in extract method #76362
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Share more code between "Generate Constructor", "Add Parameter" and "Initialize Member from Parameter" #76359
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Cache the MEF composition in the Roslyn LSP. #76276
    Area-IDE, LSP, VSCode, Next
  • Update the Copilot powered Inline Rename UX #76001
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Support adding package and reference assemblies from an import #76337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable signing validation for the PR Val pipeline. #76353
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary parentheses from spread elements #76348
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add tests showing issues no longer repro #76346
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not pull out 'using local decl' variables unnecessarily in extract method. #76343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow extract method even when tokens aren't perfectly selected by the user. #76345
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue with remove unused members and ref-fields #76336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Indent expressions when converting to object initializer #76334
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix broken 'convert if to switch' case with recursive analysis #76317
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle other initializer kinds in ref safety analysis #76339
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Ref Fields
  • Threading fixes #76230
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove scope variance exceptions #76296
    Area-Compilers
  • Check ref safety of arg mixing in collection initializers #76237
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ref Fields, 17.13
  • Prefer ReadOnlySpan over Span as better conversion target #76300
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Allow user to control if they want generated-doc results to appear in navigate to. #74765
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When adding blazor scaffolding AddDBContext overwrites AddDBContextFactory and so cause app not to build #59423
  • MapStaticAssets issue with images references only in specific build machine #59418
  • The video tag does not autoplay when the source is mapped to a variable in a Blazor Server app .net 6. #59415
  • Ajax EditForm in Blazor Static SSR Pages #59413
  • Perf regression: json #59410
  • Perf improvement: updates #59409
  • what is the minimum supported version of blazor.web.js in .net9 #59408
  • .NET 9 on IIS 10 [I also don't know what to call this error] #59407

Closed

  • .NET 9 breaks ShouldSerializeXXX methods in data model (NullReferenceException) #59402
  • [Blazor] Tutorial for Blazor web that introduces the main framework features without going in depth #51570
    .NET 10 Planning
  • MultipartReaderStream ignores offset using Read #59269
    10.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: caching #59381
  • Weak Encryption in ManagedPbkdf2Provider class #59329
  • About RateLimiting middleware get RateLimiterOptions #56573
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #59382
  • Perf improvement: single_query #59401

PullRequests

Created

  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor.Decrypt flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/9.0] Fix MultipartReaderStream synchronous read when using buffer offset #59422
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • Fix EventCountersAndMetricsValues and VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues flaky tests #59411
    area-hosting
  • Use the Installers Arcade package to build the ref pack and targeting pack installers #59406
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix MultipartReaderStream synchronous read when using buffer offset #59360
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix publishing from new linux legs #59412
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Tests.Http2ConnectionTests.AbortSendsFinalGOAWAY` #59359
    area-infrastructure
  • Update README.md #59191
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Skip MVC template tests on HelixQueueArmDebian12 #59295
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Change OpenAPI document name resolution to be case-insensitive #59199
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • [release/2.3] Fix Mvc.FunctionalTests referencing RazorPagesClassLibrary #59361
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Fix Kestrel host header mismatch handling when port in Url #59403
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Fix Kestrel host header mismatch handling when port in Url #59362
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24609.2 #59389
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • maddress does not work in the new SOS since the release v8.0.547301 #5091
    10.0.0

Updated

  • Diagnostics Repo Engineering Summary #3884
    10.0.0
  • !clrstack reports incorrect method names when <> is encountered #4314
    Future
  • ElfFileKeyGenerator does not accept OS Specific ET_LOOS .. ET_HIOS as valid #5089

PullRequests

Created

  • Add JavaScript and WASM symbols conventions #5096

Merged

  • Fix !maddress does work - issue #5091 #5094

Updated

  • Update linux build images #5097
  • Distributed tracing support #5078

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error on dotnet workload install or update #26518
  • [testing] Resizetizer unit tests failing on ARM #26516
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Targeting ONLY Windows requires the maui-tizen workload #26511

    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [CollectionView] EmptyView with button doesn't t work on iOS #26508
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Reenable DropEventCoordinates UI test #26507
    Backlog
  • [Android] No Visual Difference When Using PlatformConfiguration.AndroidSpecific SetUseDefaultPadding and SetUseDefaultShadow in Button #26505
    Backlog
  • WindowManagerFlags.Secure does not block screenshots on modal pages in Android Net 9 #26502
  • Maui net8 & net9 - Tab pages do not activate OnAppearing [Mac] #26499
    Backlog
  • Issue on Windows - Exception thrown: 'System.NullReferenceException' in Microsoft.Maui.Controls.dll #26498
    Backlog
  • ListView headers gets invisible when collapsing/expanding sections on IOS, Mac and Android #26494
    Backlog
  • [Windows] ListView Items Text Not Rendered inside the TabbedPage #26488
    Backlog
  • System image download error. #26487
  • Windows packaging fails when MAUI project name has an underscore in it #26486
    Backlog

Closed

  • [iOS & Mac] Gradient background size is incorrect when invalidating parent #26057
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Can't use LinearGradientBrush as Button Background on iOS #20218
    Backlog
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Background layer frame mapping has poor performance #24847
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Shell.FlyoutItemIsVisible on FlyoutItem in Shell binding does not update #26434
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Intermittent System.IO Errors During Build, Rebuild, and Clean Operations #26517
  • Windows local notification using Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.Notifications #24788
    Backlog
  • MAUI building MAC catalyst Arm64 dll is not getting loaded and throws System.BadImageException #26500
  • Flyout menu (Hamburger menu) appears "out of nowhere" when BackbuttonBehaviour is defined (Android only) #26470
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Issue with TouchBehavior Background Color Remaining After Navigation in .NET MAUI (iOS 18) #25280
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] GroupedItemTemplateCollection CollectionChanged event not unsubscribed, causes memory leak. #22954
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] ListView ScrollTo Method Throws NullReferenceException #26345
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Editor Scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25581
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Exception when adding Pin to Map control. #26459

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: TimeOnly arithmetic is translated incorrectly #35311
  • Cosmos: DateTimeOffset with non-zero offsets are not supported by functions #35310
  • EF Core 9: when altering views in migrationbuilder.Sql(), script-migration now creates multiple statements in the batch #35309
  • EF Core 9: HierarchyId extension registration API is missing for Azure SQL #35307
  • Unable to cast and similar exceptions should include property and entity name when feasible. #35306
  • Issues with EF Core 8 Model Compilation #35305
  • Issue with EFScaffoldModelStage and entity named Module #35304

Closed

  • EF9 InMemory database causes InvalidOperationException when calling RelationalTypeBaseExtensions.GetTableMappings() #35220
  • EF Core error when inserting new records with multiple relation with another entity. #35302
  • Scaffolding with required modifier for nullable enabled projects #35291
  • When reporting PendingModelChangesWarning, look into including information on the model discrepancy #35292
  • Temporal table migration regression from EF Core 8 to 9 #35108
    9.0.2
  • Migrations: CreateTableBuilder<TColumns> Annotation(string name, object value) should accept object? instead #35281
    10.0.0
  • Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key') issue on Concurrent/Duplicate updates #35185
  • Regression in EF9 for CosmosDb, 'CountAsync' broken #35245
  • Issues with EF Tools (9.0.0) and MS.CodeAnalysis.WorkSpaces.MSBuild (4.8.0) #35258
  • Improvements on development migrations (command to apply schema without generating migration files) #35296

PullRequests

Created

  • Update BenchmarkDotNet #35312
  • Interpretation testing #35308

Merged

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35108 - Temporal table migration regression from EF Core 8 to 9 #35289
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.2
  • [TINY] Fix to #35281 - Migrations: CreateTableBuilder<TColumns> Annotation(string name, object value) should accept object? instead #35297
